author: dwar

review: I dig this...the only thing that I wish I could change is when I'm traveling in a hotel.  I want to watch something from my computer on my tv, so easy...just click the Chromecast button in Chrome (and turn the tv on).  It's so easy and seamless.I love the multi-tasking aspect...I can keep using my computer (I'm watching a youtube video on my tv while I'm typing this right now!) while watching.  Makes it all so easy.I wish it was easier to attach the chromecast device to a hotel wi-fi network.  If that could easily be fixed I will change my review to five stars.
